content: निष्पिष् {c7c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To pound, powder, pulverize, reduce to atoms; (तं) निष्पिपेष क्षितौ क्षिप्रं पूर्णं कुंभमिवांभसि <ls>Mb.</ls>; शिलानिष्पिष्टमुद्गरः <ls>R. 12. 73.</ls> {@--2@} To hurt, injure, bruise; <ls>Bk. 6. 120</ls>. {@--3@} To rub the hands. {@--4@} To gnash the teeth. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} To destroy.
